text: Wolves of the City is a 1929 American crime film directed by Leigh Jason and written by Carl Krusada and Vin Moore. The film stars Bill Cody, Sally Blane, Al Ferguson, Monte Montague, Louise Carver and Charles Clary. The film was released on February 24, 1929, by Universal Pictures. ==Plot== ==Cast== *Bill Cody as Jack Flynn *Sally Blane as Helen Marsh *Al Ferguson as Mike *Monte Montague as Roscoe Jones *Louise Carver as Mother Machin *Charles Clary as Frank Marsh ==References== ==External links== * Category:1929 films Category:American films Category:English-language films Category:American crime films Category:1929 crime films Category:Universal Pictures films Category:Films directed by Leigh Jason Category:American silent feature films Category:American black-and-white films
title: Wolves of the City
